name: Sigils of Elohim
summary: Sigils of Elohim is a free mini-game prelude to Croteam’s upcoming first-person puzzler The Talos Principle that challenges players to solve dozens of formidable sigil puzzles under the watchful eye of Elohim. Subjects are tasked with deciphering a series of puzzle sets by rotating and placing the sigil shapes within the board in an effort to unlock helpful items and relics within The Talos Principle.
info:
• 中文名: 神之符印
  • 开发: Croteam
  • 发行: Devolver Digital
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: 休闲, 独立, 策略
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 2014年10月13日
  • 售价: 免费
  • 官方网站: www.croteam.com/games
